mutants.code:
import re
PATTERN = re.compile('^M{0,4}(CM|CD|D?C{0,3})(XC|XL|L?X{0,3})(IX|IV|V?I{0,3})$')

def filter_valid_roman_numerals(arr):
    return [e for e in arr if e or PATTERN.match(e)]
